item.title: Two Dutch teenagers arrested in spying case linked to Russia
item.description: The pair were allegedly recruited by pro-Russian hackers and used a "wi-fi sniffer" on the Europol headquarters.

item.title: Mass arrests for sextortion and romance scams in sting operation across Africa
item.description: Some 260 suspects were arrested in the operation across 14 African countries, says Interpol.

item.title: Tony Blair in discussions to run transitional Gaza authority
item.description: The former prime minister has been in high-level planning talks over the territory's future, the BBC understands.

item.title: Former FBI director James Comey indicted on two charges
item.description: James Comey says he is innocent and the charges are politically motivated, as they follow Trump pressure on prosecutors to act.

item.title: Taiwan convicts ex-presidential aide of spying for China
item.description: A court said the espionage was carried out "over a long period" and involved "important intelligence".
